lead_paragraph: After Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey eliminated elephants from its lineup, the circus must balance its nostalgic appeal with modernization efforts.

headline.print_headline: Without Elephants, Ringling Circus Goes On
headline.main: Can the Circus Go On Without Elephants? Ringling Bets It Can

snippet: After Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey eliminated elephants from its lineup, the circus must balance its nostalgic appeal with modernization efforts....
abstract: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus is set to premiere Out of This World, its first new production since retiring elephants; show still includes other animal performances along with several new elements, but it remains to be seen whether audiences will accept circus without traditional elephant acts.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus
